title: Aegility FL Longsleeve Men
description: Practical functional shirt for hiking: the Aegility Longsleeve Men is quick drying and breathable. It impresses with a Polygiene antimicrobial treatment to reduce unpleasant odors as well as a lightweight, comfortable stretch material. The melange effect gives this functional shirt a trendy look.

title: Rime Light IN Flex Vest Men
description: Ideal as a thermal layer when using the layering principle, to keep the core of your body warm. The extremely light Rime Light Vest fits snugly to the body thanks to its stretch insulation and side inserts made from elastic Polartec® Power Grid™ fleece. The Pertex® Quantum Air lining makes the vest wind-repellent as well as particularly breathable, extremely light and compressible.

title: Taiss Light Mid GTX Women
description: Taiss Light Mid GTX. A new generation of mountaineering boots to bring you closer to the summit. At Mammut, we place great importance on a light weight and lasting durability combined with high performance in alpine terrain. The shoe meets this requirement with perfectly coordinating materials and technologies.

title: Cargo Trolley 90
description: A wheeled luggage version of the popular Mammut Cargo bag. The 90-liter version offers plenty of space for all your equipment; a separate, ventilated compartment for mountain boots and many other options for organizing the equipment. A stable telescopic handle and high-quality rubber wheels make this trolley a robust and reliable partner on travels around the globe.

title: Nordwand Light HS Pants
description: You like to move fast and every gram counts when it comes to packing. You also expect durable and reliable weather protection in extreme conditions. The Nordwand Light Pants have been developed for ambitious mountain sports enthusiasts. Featuring a Mammut DRYtechnology™ Performance 3‑layer material.

title: Aenergy Light SO Shorts Women
description: If your ambitions rise with the temperatures, these are the shorts for you! With the basics covered by the two zippered pockets and an adjustable waistband, the magic is in the fabric. Lightweight and breathable to keep cool on hot days, the double-weave construction offers the rugged durability

title: Classic T-Shirt Men
description: A cult T-shirt: Classic T-Shirt Men - a faithful companion for sporting activities or leisure wear. The T-shirt is made from organically produced cotton. But it’s not just its sustainability that is impressive, it looks good too. With the classic Mammut logo print on the front, the T-shirt creates an eye-catching effect.

title: Classic trucker Crag Cap
description: Classic trucker cap as useful sun protection during your mountain activities and in everyday life. Choose your personal cap from a wide selection of Mammut themes. Mesh fabric on the back for good ventilation. Individually adjustable to head size.

title: Cartridge Refillable 207 Bar Alu
description: The cartridge is an essential component of the avalanche airbag system and must be ordered separately. It can be refilled by the user after any deployment using a compressor or diving cylinder. The filling pressure of the cartridge can be checked quickly and safely using a pressure gauge. The Cartridge Refill Kit and a compressed air source are required for refilling.

title: Togir 2.0 3 Slide Harness Women
description: Reducing weight was a key focus for the new edition of our popular all-rounder: only the primary gear loops are reinforced, making them especially easy to clip, while the rear ones are soft, making them even lighter. Together with the two ice clipper slots, this harness offers plenty of rack space.

title: Alugator Pro Light
description: You can rely on the Alugator Pro Light in extreme situations. The avalanche shovel features a hardened and anodized aluminum blade that can cut through the snow in the avalanche deposit. The ergonomically shaped grip provides efficient transfer of strength, while the stabilization ribs afford high.

title: Pro 35 Removable Airbag 3.0 ready
description: The Pro 35 Removable Airbag 3.0 ready is designed to meet the needs of mountain guides and other experts. It is compatible with our Airbag System 3.0 – one of the lightest on the market. Orange elements make you more visible from a distance. Optimized hip belt and shoulder straps as well as the new.
